qas.question: Who created the circumlunar program called Zond?
Which type of craft were two astronauts to fly in during Zond?

context: The circumlunar program (Zond), created by <a0_0>Vladimir Chelomey<a0_0/>'s design bureau OKB-52, was to fly two cosmonauts in a stripped-down <a1_0>Soyuz 7K-L1<a1_0/>, launched by Chelomey's Proton UR-500 rocket. The Zond sacrificed habitable cabin volume for equipment, by omitting the Soyuz orbital module. Chelomey gained favor with Khruschev by employing members of his family.
